TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlDesigner extends System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner

summary.span: 扩展 的设计模式行为。

span.span: Extends the design mode behavior of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自的组件的设计器提供基类。provides a base class for designers of components that derive from . 除了方法和功能从继承类，提供了其他方法来支持扩展和更改的关联行为在设计时。In addition to the methods and functionality inherited from the class, provides additional methods to support extending and altering the behavior of an associated at design time. 可以将设计器关联的类型使用。You can associate a designer with a type using a . 有关自定义设计时行为的概述，请参阅[扩展设计时支持](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100))。For an overview of customizing design time behavior, see [Extending Design-Time Support](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/37899azc(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例实现演示了如何处理`MouseEnter`并`MouseLeave`事件，从设计器代码中，在控件上绘制和使用的一部分接口在设计时添加控件的属性。The following example implementation demonstrates handling `MouseEnter` and `MouseLeave` events, drawing on a control from designer code, and using part of the interface to add a property for the control at design time. 下面的示例代码包含了设计器和示例用户控件的设计器关联。The following sample code contains a designer and a sample user control associated with the designer. 若要生成此示例，将示例编译为类库、 到 Windows 窗体项目添加到库的引用、 将控件添加到工具箱中，和向窗体添加控件的实例。To build this sample, compile the sample into a class library, add a reference to the library to a Windows Forms project, add the control to the Toolbox, and add an instance of the control to your form. 当指向控件时，突出显示的控件的外围网络内部的轮廓时，用来绘制轮廓的颜色对应于`OutlineColor`控件设计器已添加到属性的属性列出。When you point to the control, the inner outline of the perimeter of the control is highlighted, and the color used to draw the outline corresponds to the `OutlineColor` property that the designer has added to the properties listed for the control. 添加对要编译的代码示例的 System.Design 程序集的引用。Add a reference to the System.Design assembly to compile the code example. [!code-cpp[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CPP/controldesignerexample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/CS/controldesignerexample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ControlDesignerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ControlDesignerExample/VB/controldesignerexample.vb#1)]

span.span: Extending Design-Time Support

summary.span: 获取与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of components associated with the component managed by the designer.

value.span: 与设计器所管理的组件关联的组件。

span.span: The components that are associated with the component managed by the designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示要复制或移动设计器在复制期间所管理的组件以及任何组件拖动，或移动操作。This property indicates any components to copy or move along with the component managed by the designer during a copy, drag, or move operation. 如果此集合包含对当前的设计模式文档中的其他组件的引用，这些组件将复制以及设计器在复制操作期间所管理的组件。If this collection contains references to other components in the current design mode document, those components will be copied along with the component managed by the designer during a copy operation. 选择设计器所管理的组件，此集合被填充任何嵌套的控件。When the component managed by the designer is selected, this collection is filled with any nested controls. 此集合还可以包含其他组件，如工具栏的按钮。This collection can also include other components, such as the buttons of a toolbar.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会导致消息处理的 Windows，正在跳过该控件。This method causes the message to be processed by Windows, skipping the control. 如果你想要阻止消息到达该控件，但不是希望阻止其进入 Windows 本身，因为它可能会导致生成其他消息，这非常有用。This is useful if you want to block the message from getting to the control, but you do not want to block it from getting to Windows itself because it can cause other messages to be generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于测试是否可以通过特定类型的父级设置为父级控件。This method is useful for testing whether a control can be parented by a particular type of parent. 例如，控件的父级只能通过控件。For example, controls can only be parented by controls. > [!NOTE] > 当从拖动项时不调用此方法**工具箱**拖到设计图面。This method is not called when an item is dragged from the **Toolbox** onto the design surface.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.span: （如果释放托管资源和非托管资源）；如果仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以多次调用由其他对象。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请小心不要引用在早期调用之前释放对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: protected bool EnableDesignMode (System.Windows.Forms.Control child, string name);
.method familyhidebysig instance bool EnableDesignMode(class System.Windows.Forms.Control child, string name) cil managed
Protected Function EnableDesignMode (child As Control, name As String) As Boolean

param.name: child
param.span: 要为其启用设计模式的子控件。

span.span: The child control for which design mode will be enabled.

param.name: name
param.span: 为最终用户公开的 名称。

span.span: The name of as exposed to the end user.

summary.span: 启用子控件的设计时功能。

span.span: Enables design time functionality for a child control.

returns.span: （如果可以启用子控件的设计时功能）；如果宿主基础结构不支持这一功能，则为 。

span.span: if the child control could be enabled for design time; if the hosting infrastructure does not support it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的子控件`child`是此控件设计器的控件的子级。The child control specified by `child` is a child of this control designer's control. 子级不直接参与持久性，但它会作为主控件的属性。The child does not directly participate in persistence, but it will if it is exposed as a property of the main control. 请考虑这样的控件： 它具有两个面板`Panel1`和`Panel2`。Consider a control like the : it has two panels, `Panel1` and `Panel2`. 通过读取仅公开这些面板并上的属性控件。These panels are exposed through read only and properties on the control. 控件的设计器调用对于每个面板，它允许在其上删除其他组件。The control's designer calls for each panel, which allows other components to be dropped on them. 但是，为了使的内容并要保存控件本身必须公开为公共属性面板。But, in order for the contents of and to be saved, the control itself must expose the panels as public properties. 控件名称中必须是唯一控件设计器，但它们不需要对于其他控件设计器的子级是唯一的。Control names must be unique within a control designer, but they are not required to be unique with respect to the children of other control designers. 若要支持此功能，托管基础结构必须公开作为通过网站服务的类。To support this feature, the hosting infrastructure must expose the class as a service through the site.

span.span: or is .

span.span: Enables or disables drag-and-drop support for the control being designed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值`false`指定控件不能具有子级拖放到它在设计时。The default value of `false` specifies that a control cannot have children dragged onto it at design time. 若要允许控件在设计时其他控件的父级，将其与关联的设计器派生。To allow a control to parent other controls at design time, associate it with a designer that derives from .

A collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，根据`selectionType`，则返回的对象将表示这些所选内容状态之一：Note that based on `selectionType`, the objects returned will represent one of these selection states: - 带握柄; 的完全可调整大小的选择边框A fully resizable selection border with grab handles; - 锁定的选择边框;A locked selection border; - 隐藏单选。A single 'hidden' selection .

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool GetHitTest(valuetype System.Drawing.Point point) cil managed
abstract member GetHitTest : System.Drawing.Point -> bool override this.GetHitTest : System.Drawing.Point -> bool

param.name: point
param.span: ，它指示屏幕坐标中单击鼠标的位置。

span.span: A indicating the position at which the mouse was clicked, in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 指示该控件是否应处理在指定点单击鼠标的操作。

span.span: Indicates whether a mouse click at the specified point should be handled by the control.

returns.span: （如果在指定点单击的操作将由该控件处理）；否则为 。

span.span: if a click at the specified point is to be handled by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确定控件是否处于设计模式时是否应将指定点处单击传递到该控件。The method determines whether a click at the specified point should be passed to the control, while the control is in design mode. 可以重写并实现此方法以使控件能够在设计时环境中接收单击。You can override and implement this method to enable your control to receive clicks in the design-time environment. > [!NOTE] > 可以传递到屏幕坐标点方法的类来获取该控件相对于左上角的点的坐标。You can pass a point in screen coordinates to the method of the class to obtain the coordinates of the point relative to the upper-left corner of the control. 响应 WM_NCHITTEST 消息，调用方法，以便在每个鼠标移动时调用。The method is called in response to the WM_NCHITTEST message, so it is called on each mouse move.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类重写此方法。The class overrides this method. 此方法查看该控件的默认属性，如果它是类型`string`，它会将此属性的值设置为组件的名称。It will look at the default property for the control and, if it is of type `string`, it will set this property's value to the name of the component. 它才会执行此设计器已配置了选项服务中此选项。It only does this if the designer has been configured with this option in the options service. 此方法还将控件连接到其父级并将其放置。This method also connects the control to its parent and positions it. 如果重写此方法时，应始终调用基类。If you override this method, you should always call base.

summary.span: 在每次需要设置光标时接收调用。

span.span: Receives a call each time the cursor needs to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可处理重定向和设置光标事件的处理。This method handles redirection and handling of the set cursor event. 如果工具箱服务具有工具处于选中状态，此方法将允许工具箱服务来设置光标。If the toolbox service has a tool selected, this method will allow the toolbox service to set the cursor. 如果选择 UI 服务具有锁定的选择，或在控件上没有任何位置属性，将设置默认箭头光标。If the selection UI service has a locked selection, or if there is no location property on the control, the default arrow cursor will be set. 如果用户正在拖动组件，将设置十字线光标。If a user is dragging a component, the crosshair cursor will be set. 否则，将设置四向的箭头光标以指示该组件，可以单击并移动。Otherwise, a four headed arrow cursor will be set to indicate that the component can be clicked and moved.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property ParentComponent As IComponent

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现只是检查是否正在设计的组件是一个控件，如果是，返回其父级。The default implementation simply checks to see if the component being designed is a control and if it is, returns its parent.

The default implementation always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这接口方法重写在设计时将一组属性添加到此设计器的组件。This interface method override adds a set of properties to this designer's component at design time. 此方法将添加以下可浏览属性： `Visible`， `Enabled`， `ContextMenu`， `AllowDrop`， `Location`， `Name`， `Controls`，和`Locked`。This method adds the following browsable properties: `Visible`, `Enabled`, `ContextMenu`, `AllowDrop`, `Location`, `Name`, `Controls`, and `Locked`.

span.span: Routes messages for the children of the specified control to each control rather than to a parent designer.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void WndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub WndProc (ByRef m As Message)
abstract member WndProc : -> unit override this.WndProc : -> unit

param.name: m
param.span: 要处理的 。

span.span: The to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息，并可以选择将其路由到控件。

span.span: Processes Windows messages and optionally routes them to the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 为每个控件通常会收到的消息调用此方法。This method is called for each message the control would usually receive. 这允许设计器，以根据需要将他们路由到该控件之前预处理的消息。This allows the designer to preprocess messages before optionally routing them to the control. 若要将消息发送到控件的方法中，调用控件的设计器上。To send the message to the control's method, call on the control's designer. > [!NOTE] > 在设计器筛选消息，因此一些消息不会发送到控件。The designer filters messages, so some messages will not be sent to the control. 例如，鼠标消息都会被截获由设计器。For example, mouse messages are intercepted by the designer. 如果这不是所需的行为，调用相反。If this is not the behavior you want, call instead. 传递`m`作为参数。Pass `m` as a parameter. （可选） 可以更改或创建一个新要传递给控件的方法。Optionally, you can alter or create a new to pass to the control's method. 下表显示消息的流。The following table shows the flow of messages. |不使用设计器Without a designer|与设计器With a designer| |------------------------|---------------------| |USER32USER32





USER32USER32|USER32USER32

`Control.Designer.`







USER32USER32| 在设计器通过替换来截获消息在控件上的属性。The designer intercepts messages by replacing the property on the control. 通常情况下，指向包含在控件内。Usually, points to the contained within the control. 在设计期间，在设计器将此替换窗口目标和缓存原始值。During design time, the designer replaces this with its own window target, and caches the original value.
